name: Syne
description:
In this game you play as an personified neural spark traveling thru an abstract representation of the brain, the goal is to gather the memories of a young girl who suffers from anterograde amnesia and bring them to the Grand Library where memories are stored long-term.

Syne was made as part of a Games for Learning project at Nord University going over a few months.

Credit:

Team Lead and Environment Artist - Fredrik Johnsen

Concept Artist and Story Writer - Huang TianChen

Programming - Leo-Kristoffer Røreng

Music and SFX - Hlib Danilov

Special Thanks - Playtesters
